title: Archive a Game Broadcast
description: After a game broadcast is complete, the full recording must be archived for future use.

tasks.description: Retrieve the high-resolution recording of the full game broadcast.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the master video file.

tasks.description: Add metadata to the file, including the date, teams, and key players.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully tags the file with relevant metadata.

tasks.description: Transfer the file to the long-term video archive.
